title: Rorg: Hero of a Past
description: Rorg and his sidekick, Socko, must protect the kingdom of Chillaxia from evil villains like Commander Boneface, Kanga-saur, Mime-o-taur, and Tar-Hand-Tula.
quote: By the power of my right arm, I’m holding my sword up!
altHero: Rorg lit up by his sword
alt2: Rorg holding up a red cape to the Mime-o-taur
alt3: Rorg’s sidekick Socko flying on an ostrich
